content.raw:
I just noticed an ABI complaint in the CI builds related to the change in the `Playback::Start` signature:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=119)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/119/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/119/API_5fABI_20report/
* I've made a comment on the original pull request as well #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/401/subt-enable-fast-log-playback/diff#comment-129364518
